name: Senior NodeJs Developer
description:
OnTarget Labs, a leading outsourcing company in Russia, is looking for a Senior NodeJs Developer to join the company on a full-time position (remote work). We offer interesting projects for U.S. and European customers, work in a young friendly team and opportunities for professional growth for employees targeted on success!

Lots of opportunities for professional growth and business trips abroad are offered. Join our friendly team of IT professionals now!

Project Description:

Our client makes software as a service (SaaS) applications for commercial service contractors and looking for its team expansion.

Responsibilities:

  • Designing and developing high-volume, low-latency features and improvements

  • Resolving application and component problems, as well as fixing bugs during the development life cycle, or as part of maintenance

  • Ensuring all designs and coding comply to documented UI requirements, user stories, security best practices, and performance guidelines

Requirements:

  • Strong background in object-oriented development. Ability to design software architecture.
  • Strong understanding of REST API's, micro-services and serverless technologies.
  • Proven proficiency at a high level in TypeScript running on NodeJs.
  • Knowledge and some experience with Amazon Stack: EC2, VPC, Route53, IAM, ECS, EKS, Lambda, Monitoring (Grafana), API Gateway, Cloudwatch, S3, Cloudformation/Terraform.
  • Database knowledge including relational and/or NoSQL databases (MS SQL, DynamoDB etc).
  • Knowledge and experience with FE frameworks (ReactJs, Meteor) is a plus.
  • Experience in unit and integration Testing, application testing and troubleshooting/debugging (Mocha, Jest) is a plus.
  • Experience working in an agile development environment.
  • Effective communication in English is a must have.

We offer:

  • Competitive salary (to be defined upon the interview results)
  • Flexible working hours
  • Remote work
  • English classes

Please have your CV in English!
